page.title: 09INDUSTRY - ENGINEERING
page.content: .THE NEWBURGH ENGINEERING COMPANY. --------------------------------- The company was built in 1938 on the site of an inn called the Newburgh Arms. They are precision engineering suppliers and produce components from the very small up to 20 tonnes or more. The products are used in a variety of industries for example Power Generators; Energy(Nuclear, Oil Gas, Coal); Armaments; Aerospace and Chemical. At this time 170 people work at the factory and most (86%) are men. Nearly half the work force are from Bradwell. Each year the firm employs 5-7 school leavers and also some disabled people. The company provides a canteen and a social club for the workforce. There is a union, but not everyone who works there is a member.
